isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcproc.title: CORNER AND SIDE INTERIOR TRIM PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Install Corner and Side Interior Trim Panel on Daycab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 74
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) inside the cab.

Position passenger side corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) over mounting holes in cab side panel and rear interior trim panel and install seven push-in fasteners (Item 4), passenger side shown.

Position shoulder belt (Item 2) in place on corner and side interior trim panel (Item 5) inside cab and install torx head bolt (Item 1), passenger side shown. Tighten to 20 to 25 Lbf-ft (27 to 34 N•m).

Install passenger air bucket seat, fixed passenger seat, or driver air bucket seat, refer to
SEATS
. For installing air passenger bucket seat, refer to Install Passenger Air Bucket Seat on Daycab. For installing fixed passenger seat, refer to Install Fixed Passenger Seat on Daycab.
SEATS
. For installing air driver bucket seat, refer to Install Driver Air Bucket Seat on Daycab.

Install passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to
CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.
Repeat procedure to install driver side corner and side interior trim panel on daycab.
